description: Numbers of form m*k with m+1 <= k <= 2m-1.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) list(lim)=my(v=List()); for(m=2,sqrt(lim), for(k=m+1,min(lim\m,2*m-1), listput(v,m*k))); Set(v) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 23 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Offset corrected by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 23 2015
